elements.label: Foreign Tech Companies
elements.description: Own and control key digital infrastructure across Africa

elements.label: African Governments
elements.description: Set national policies but often depend on foreign funding and platforms

elements.label: Donor Institutions
elements.description: Fund infrastructure projects and influence policy directions

elements.label: Digital Dependency in Africa
elements.description: A result of limited local control over data, platforms, and policies

elements.label: Citizens
elements.description: Often excluded from governance decisions but directly affected by them

elements.label: Infrastructure Ownership
elements.description: Refers to control over data centers, telecom networks, and physical platforms

elements.label: Data Ownership & Control
elements.description: Concerns over who owns and governs African user data

elements.label: Funding Flows
elements.description: How money moves from donors to governments or corporations

elements.label: Policy Influence
elements.description: How policy is shaped through international standards or conditional funding

elements.label: Local Startups & Developers
elements.description: Build local tools but struggle with limited resources and reach

elements.label: Civil Society & NGOs
elements.description: Advocate for rights, inclusion, and accountability
